H0.text: Medium is what the speed of sound depends on.

H1.text: Light is the factor that the speed of sound depends on.

H2.text: Volume is the factor that the speed of sound depends on.

H3.text: Temperature is what the speed of sound depends on.

A4.text: the speed of sound depends on temperature and composition only, not on the pressure or density (since these change in lockstep for a given temperature and cancel out)

A5.text: the speed of sound is variable and depends on the properties of the substance through which the wave is travelling
